itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, Jessie Wiseman, and Tiffany Hart bring you the realest fake news of the week starting off with Trump's acquittal, why the Iowa Caucus still isn't counted yet and won't be until next week, the Ohio man who received 55,000 cop...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Dan Hollaway, Jessie Wiseman, and Tiffany Hart bring you the realest fake news of the week starting off with Trump's acquittal, why the Iowa Caucus still isn't counted yet and won't be until next week, the Ohio man who received 55,000 copies of the exact same letter, Santuary states and how Homeland Security has stopped offering Global Entry and other trusted-traveler programs to New York residents, why Switzerland is divided over a new law against homophobia, how Barnes & Noble cancels plan to put people of color on the covers of classic books after backlash, and Ross gives you every single Oscar prediction to help you win your neighborhood pools.
